experice.content: • Acquired proficiency in state management methodologies throughout the course of the internship, acquired foundational knowledge of Node.js, and developed a more comprehensive understanding of React.js.

• Optimized platform performance to enhance user experience
  • Implemented innovative features to enrich the platform's capabilities
  • Proactively analyzed and addressed potential issues for continuous improvement
  • Fostered effective collaboration with cross-functional teams for seamless integration

• Gained a deep understanding and proficiency in applying advanced OOP principles.
  • Developed comfort and proficiency in utilizing Java for testing various types of web interfaces.
  • Acquired skills in testing APIs using Java.
  • Learned the essential concepts and practices of Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) and Docker.
